instrupy.base.InstrumentModelFactory¶

class instrupy.base.InstrumentModelFactory[source]¶

Factory class which allows to register and invoke the appropriate instrument-model class.

BasicSensorModel, PassiveOpticalScannerModel, SyntheticApertureRadarModel and RadiometerModel instrument-model classes are registered in the factory. Additional user-defined instrument-model classes can be registered as shown below:

Usage:

factory = instrupy.InstrumentModelFactory()
factory.register_instrument_model('Doppler Radar 2021', DopplerRadar)
instru1 = factory.get_instrument_model('Doppler Radar 2021')
Variables

_creators (dict) – Dictionary mapping instrument type label to the appropriate instrument class.
